## RESTClient.responseInterceptor() method

Allows to intercept all responses for all methods in class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected responseInterceptor(res: Observable<any>): Observable<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  res | <code>Observable&lt;any&gt;</code> | response object |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<any>`

res - transformed response object
